Header: 513 Brigade Troops Help Civilians Cure Eye Sight Ailments
Content: Two Mobile Eye Clinics were conducted for civilians at Wadukkodei Hospital and Karainagar Subramuniam College by troops under command to the 513 Brigade of the 51 Division on Friday (7) and Saturday (8) respectively. These eye clinics were organized under the supervision of Major General Roshan Senevirathne, General Officer Commanding (GOC), 51 Division with the motive of helping the needy in the area. Colombo Rotary Club sponsored this charity event with Australiaâ€™s Global Hand Mil Point Rotary Club. 12 eye specialists with 3 medical students attended both clinics. More than 1180 civilians affected with various eye ailments reached both places for consultation.
